abstracts.cdata!:
The Highway Maintenance Project consists
            of: (a) technical assistance, including a training program,
            for about two and a half years to help the Government
            improve highway administration and maintenance; (b) purchase
            of maintenance and workshop equipment, vehicles, spare
            parts, and materials; (c) construction or improvement of
            workshops, garages, and warehouses; and (d) improvement of
            about 30 kilometers of roads.
